name: Wrong data
about: Create a report to help us improve the data quality
title: "[DATA]"
labels: ''
assignees: ''

---

**Which record**
eg "Record 2015-01-27-11-31-32 is incorrect."

**Which files are affected**
XML File, Audio Files (one record or multiple) or the Transcription List

**What is the precise fault**
eg "In the related XML File the cleaned sentence is _Überlegen Sie sich was Sie tun gute Frau_ but the record is _Überlegen Sie_"

**Additional context**
Add any other context about the problem here.
